column2: Enables casus belli §GDe Jure Duchy Claim§!\n
Opinion penalty of §R-15§! from all rulers affected by the crown laws of §Y[This.GetBaseName]§! for §Y10§! years\n
Crown Authority for §Y[This.GetBaseName]§! may only be raised once per lifetime\n
Investiture law for §Y[This.GetBaseName]§! may only be changed once per lifetime\n
Crown authority has been unlocked for merchant republics (customization decision)\n
§Y[This.GetFullName]§! has no crown law title affecting it.\n
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you.
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you. At this level you would be forgoing tax for the sake of levies to a major extent.
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you. At this level you would be forgoing tax for the sake of levies to some extent.
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you. At this level you would not be focusing on any area.
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you. At this level you would be forgoing levies for the sake of tax to some extent.
Tribal Focus changes the composition of their obligations to you. At this level you would be forgoing levies for the sake of tax to a major extent.
Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies.
Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies. At this level they will not provide you anything beyond what the slider dictates.
Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies. At this level they will provide you a bit more than what the sliders dictate.

Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies. At this level they will provide you a moderate amount more than what the sliders dictate.
Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies. At this level they will provide you a lot more than what the sliders dictate.
Obligations determine how much your vassals of that type have to provide to you, increasing both tax and levies. At this level they will provide you much more than what the sliders dictate.
